title: 1939년 Opinion No. 사건
summary: 미국 Oklahoma, OK 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Opinion No.. 판결일: 1939-06-05. 법원: Oklahoma Attorney General Reports.

## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Charles E. Draper County Attorney
**판결일**: 1939-06-05
**법원**: Oklahoma Attorney General Reports
**관할**: Oklahoma, OK


## 판결문 요약

OPINION — AG — THERE IS NOT LEGAL INHIBITION AGAINST THE EMPLOYMENT OF THE TEACHER REFERRED TO IN YOUR LETTER (WIFE IS A SISTER OF ONE OF THE MEMBERS OF THE SCHOOL BOARD) BY REASON OF HIS RELATIONSHIP TO THE MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE TOWN OF WAPANUCKA. CITE: OPINION NO. MARCH 9, 1936 — GINDER, OPINION NO. APRIL 23, 1937 — COUNTS, 21 Ohio St. 481 [21-481] ** NEPOTISM LAWS **  (J. HARRY JOHNSON)...
